text: Jolanta Lothe (19 April 1942 – 1 April 2022) was a Polish actress. Her career began in 1965. She played Basia in the 1969 movie Hunting Flies and Terka in the 1974 movie The Deluge. Lothe died on 1 April 2022 in Warsaw, Poland, eighteen days before her 80th birthday.Nie żyje aktorka Jolanta Lothe. Znana z serialu "Barwy szczęścia" i filmu "Potop" ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish stage actors
title: Jolanta Lothe
